mapper.select: SELECT s.ifstName ,r.ifrvDate ,r.ifrvTime from reservation r left join store s on s.ifstSeq = r.ifstSeq where 1=1 and r.ifmmSeq = 1 Order by r.ifrvDate DESC

SELECT s.ifstName ,r.ifrvDate ,r.ifrvPerson ,s.ifstAddress ,mm.ifmmName ,mm.ifmmPhone ,mm.ifmmEmail ,mn.ifmnName ,r.ifrvCount ,r.ifrvPrice FROM reservation r Left join store s on s.ifstSeq = r.ifstSeq Left join member mm on mm.ifmmSeq = r.ifmmSeq Left join menu mn on mn.ifmnSeq = r.ifmnSeq WHERE 1=1 AND r.ifmmSeq = 1 AND r.ifrvSeq = 8
